meanings.definition: A method of cooking fish by dredging it in flour and sautéing it in butter.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious meuniere for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The meuniere was crispy and flavorful.
meanings.sent3: The meuniere danced in the sizzling pan, turning golden brown.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the meuniere filled the kitchen, tempting everyone.
meanings.sent5: The meuniere sizzled in the hot butter, creating a mouth-watering dish.
